review: It would be much better if there was an app for the Silk browser or any internet browser. There is a pretty good selection of TV shows and movies for free.  I do like the voice search.  Not having the browser is my greatest fault I can find with this item.
author: Sherlynn

review: Gary Busey is awesome and so is Amazon Fire TV! Apps, videos, music, games....Incredible! I am going to purchase one for the bedroom TV as well. For the extra price, the wired option, more app/game/video variety, and more memory is worth it. First thing I did was search for....you guessed it...Gary Busey. It was AWESOME.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Most movies are not free, I did not think I would have to pat any fees to watch them. Your advertizement does not specify fees for watching movies or music videos. I am very disappointed with my purchase it is not worth having. I should have gotten Direct TV.
author: Richard Liberi

review: Not a review but a question ... for Amazon and any other users outside the USA. What features are available outside the USA? There seems to be no information page dedicated for this. I have noticed Amazon products being sold in Australia (tablets,phones,etc) but the sellers are not aware of the details and importantly what is not applicable to non-USA. Amazon started a revolutionary idea in the original kindle in being able to access content from anywhere but the full tablets seem to be presenting difficulties with this concept and there is no official position (that I can see). It would be great to buy a product like this and access free and paid content from a different part of the world - isn't that what the whole idea was about?
author: Shakeel Aziz

review: I thought I was buying something I wouldn't have to pay for something else.At no point does it say you only get Amazon free........so anything else you want you pay for. Disappointing.
author: Deana Escanuelas

review: Love it! But it needs an "off" button on the remote, the light remains on after I turn my tv off. It is supposed to go into sleep mode on its own but it does not always do so. Just a minor annoyance which I resolve by placing the device in "sleep" mode manually through the "systems menu".  Still a great product.  If I had to ask for more I would like access to apps like YouTube available. ...maybe an update idea Amazon (hint, hint)
